pageContext.claim: “We just had the largest order of corn in the history of our country last week, the largest order of soybeans, largest order of beef, because they know I'm very unhappy. They know I'm very, very unhappy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump routinely claims that China recently placed the largest order of soybeans and corn in history. But that's wrong. The largest daly order of corn, by far, were placed by the Soviet Union in 1991 -- 3.7 million metric tons, according to the Department of Agriculture. China's order on July 30 ranks third. And no soybean orders by China in 2020 have made it in the list of the top 15 daily sales.
